Design

Humans of Mudd

February 2020

Using Photoshop, I created the logo and cover photo for the social media accounts of Humans of Mudd, a human interest project I started at my college to highlight individuals in my community.

The Muddraker Newspaper Layouts (Harvey Mudd College)

September 2019 - Present

I created the graphics for these layouts using Adobe Photoshop, in addition to putting the elements of all the pages together using Adobe InDesign. I also took photos for many of the layouts.

In March 2020, when we were told we had to leave campus due to COVID-19, we were in the final stages of production for The Muddraker. I pushed hard to finish the newspaper, completing 10 pages of design in just a few days, in the hopes of bringing some cheer to Mudd community members through the newspaper

the Epic Newspaper Layouts

August 2016 - June 2019

Using Photoshop and InDesign, I created these layouts and graphics, including all vectors, completely from scratch for the in-depth and opinion sections of the newspaper. In designing my pages, I always made sure to keep the articles in mind so that the layout would accurately reflect the content it accompanied. I especially enjoyed conveying the perspectives of our opinion stories through thought-provoking layouts.

DECA Business Plan Cover Pages

March 2017 & April 2018

Using Photoshop, I made these cover pages for my DECA business club operations research plan. I also took photos for the cover pages. These pages were a part of regional 1st Place and state 3rd Place award-winning submissions that qualified for the DECA International Career Development Conference.

Promotional Profile Pictures

May 2017 & October 2017

Using Photoshop, I made these promotional profile pictures for my DECA business club incubator event, as well as my varsity tennis team's senior night, so that each student group could promote its respective event.

Promotional Brochures, Flyers, and Profile Pictures

2017 - 2019

Using Canva, I made these promotional brochures, flyers, and profile pictures for my DECA business club, my student newspaper, my French Honor Society, my psychology and sociology club, and my Harvey Mudd College first-year class president campaign.

I built this website using HTML, CSS, Sass, and JavaScript.

Acknowledgements

I would like to acknowledge Brad Traversy of Traversy Media for his helpful video guide on creating a responsive website, as well as W3Schools and Codecademy for their useful instruction on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
